name: legibility

the fact of being easy to read, or the degree to which something is easy to read: Our job is to ensure the accuracy and legibility of clinical documents. Factors such as type design and layout affect the legibility of the text. Opposite
illegibility
More examplesFewer examplesThis allows you to fit more copy in the headline without compromising legibility.The relationship between handwriting speed and legibility was investigated.The layout and font size of contracts was regulated, in the interests of legibility.

the degree to which writing or text can be read easily because the letters are clear, the text is printed well, etc.: Among the changes we recommend are the removal of unnecessary text from labels, greater legibility, the use of larger print, and less glaring colours.
